alert.note: Alert for Lower Washington County (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 5:43PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Washington County through 615 PM MDT... At 543 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of St George, or 20 miles east of Virgin River Gorge, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... St George, Washington, Hurricane, La Verkin, Sand Hollow State Park, Quail Creek State Park and Virgin. This includes Interstate 15 between mile markers 10 and 20. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
